item.title: Poll atmosphere excellent, debate positive: EC Anwarul
item.description: Despite reports of clashes between supporters of rival candidates across the country, Election Commissioner Md Anwarul Islam Sarker describes the polling environment as “excellent". He also views speeches and debates around pledges and manifestos at rallies as “positive”.
